Light Poles.description: Jegr Jalal specializes in manufacturing durable, high-quality light poles designed to enhance both function and aesthetics in public and private spaces.

subcategories.Decorative Light Poles: Elegant, custom-designed poles that blend with architectural environments.
subcategories.Modern Light Poles: Sleek and functional designs suited for modern urban infrastructure.
subcategories.Standard Light Poles: Reliable and robust poles used for general street and area lighting.

Landscape.description: Complete landscaping product line designed to support urban beautification and outdoor functionality.

subcategories.Landscaping: Soft and hardscape solutions tailored to client needs.
subcategories.Benches: Comfortable and durable seating for parks, streets, and public areas.
subcategories.Trash Cans: Stylish and practical waste containers for urban cleanliness.
subcategories.Stamp Concrete: Decorative concrete finishes for pavements, plazas, and walkways.
subcategories.Industrial Basalt: Strong basalt stone for heavy-duty flooring and outdoor surfaces.
subcategories.Kerb Stone: Essential for road and landscape edge definition.
subcategories.Games and Outdoor Training Equipment: Safe and durable outdoor recreational and fitness installations.
subcategories.Booths: Functional outdoor booths for commercial and public use.
subcategories.Shades: Weather-resistant shades for seating areas, walkways, and parks.

Urban Design.description: Urban furniture and infrastructure elements that enhance safety, navigation, and visual harmony.

subcategories.Guard Rail: Metal safety barriers for roads, highways, and pedestrian areas.
subcategories.Road Signs: Customized road signage for traffic control and navigation.
subcategories.Traffic Lights: Modern traffic signal systems for urban and intersection control.
